"Anan": "Gah, I forgot to introduce myself. I'm Anan."
"It hasn't been long since I came to this camp, but for the time being, I've been put in charge of food service."
"Currently I'm in the middle of coming up with a plan to make a great menu using ingredients from Stia."
"But we don't really have the spare ingredients to just use like that, so I'm kinda stuck."
"That's why, if you don't mind, I want to ask you for help..."
"Can you go get me some \"Nourishing Stia Hermit Crab\" and \"Sharp Stia Octopus\"?"
"They can both be found in Stia's Fringes."
